head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WINTER, JOHN H.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WINTER, JOHN H.

block.p: WINTER--John H., on June 19th, 2005. Beloved husband of Mildred (nee Machleid). Loving father of Michele (Barry) and Laurel (Anthony). Cherished grandfather of Johnny and Kara. Former musician and real estate broker. Visiting hours are on Tuesday, 2-5 and 7-9 PM, at McLaughlin & Sons Funeral Home, Third Avenue at 97th Street, Brooklyn. Service will be held at 8 PM, Tuesday, at the funeral home.
